1370: Ydier moved to Helle voet.B.7 after marriage.
Got married to Gisele at age 24 in 1370.
1371: Lost daughter Gisele when Gisele was 0 years old.
Gisele gave birth to their stillborn daughter Gisele in 1371.
1373: Had a son with Gisele, Amisius, at age 27.
1374: Had a daughter with Gisele, Gheesen, at age 28.
1376: Had a son with Gisele, Sander, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Gisele, Eingeliadis, at age 32.
1379: Had a daughter with Gisele, Ghodelde, at age 33.
1382: Lost his wife Gisele while she was giving birth to Wigherus in 1382.
Became caretaker of Amisius, Gheesen, Sander, Eingeliadis, Ghodelde, Wigherus at age 37.
1390: Lost son Wigherus when Wigherus was 9 years old.
